page.title: 08A Saturday in the life of...
page.content: On Saturday I wake up at about half past 7 and read for about an hour.After breakfast,I wash and clean my teeth,then take my dog,Tim,for a long walk,sometimes letting him off his lead.At about quarter to 11 we set off for Judo.If Dad goes to work in the car it's a lot earlier as we have to go on our bikes.Judo finishes at about twenty past 12.Once home,we have some dinner,then I either play on my computer,watch television or play out,unless we have something special we have to do.In the evening I have a bath,then watch television till about half past 9 (unless there is a good film on the television).This is a typical Saturday in the life of Philip Worthington.I am 11 years of age and live at 20 Victoria Park Avenue,Lea,Preston.
